favourite.article: Перевод на русский: Славьте, славьте, Он наш благой Искупитель, Пой земля вся славу любви Христа. Торжествуйте, вышние ангелы в славе, Честь и славу наши поют уста. Словно Пастырь, Иисус хранит нас в мире, В Его руки мы себя предаем. Припев: Славьте, славьте благость Его и величье, Славьте, славьте, радостно мы поем Славьте, славьте, Он наш благой Искупитель, Он за грешных крестную смерть принял. Он Господь и наша надежда спасенья, Слава, слава, людям свет воссиял. Наши скорби Он претерпел на древе, Показал нам силу любви во всём. Припев Славьте, славьте, Он наш благой Искупитель, Здесь и в небе славит Тебя вся тварь Наш Спаситель, царствуй во веки и веки, Ты увенчан Первосвященник и Царь Се гряди же, Господи наш Иисусе, В Своей славе, с Духом Святым — огнем. Припев
The version shared by Jay Sax reminded me of my childhood. We praised God at sunday school with this song. Thank you.
I agree. I love the musIc but I use a hymnal for the words. Thank you for providing this tool to help me sing praises to my Redeemer.

I learned this long ago to slightly different words. Do you track such things or provide tools to do so? If nothing else, would it not be most respectful to the author to either continue with the words as written, or to trace the change, the reason, etc? I would find that fascinating of itself. Maybe I learned the variant, and yours is the original! Praise Him! Praise Him! Jesus, our blessèd Redeemer! Sing, O Earth, His wonderful love proclaim! Hail Him! hail Him! highest archangels in glory; Strength and honor give to His holy Name! Like a shepherd, Jesus will guard His children, In His arms He carries them all day long: Refrain Praise Him! Praise Him! Tell of His excellent greatness. Praise Him! Praise Him! Ever in joyful song! Praise Him! Praise Him! Jesus, our blessèd Redeemer! For our sins He suffered, and bled, and died. He our Rock, our hope of eternal salvation, Hail Him! hail Him! Jesus the Crucified. Sound His praises! Jesus who bore our sorrows, Love unbounded, wonderful, deep and strong. Refrain Praise Him! Praise Him! Jesus, our blessèd Redeemer! Heav’nly portals loud with hosannas ring! Jesus, Savior, reigneth forever and ever. Crown Him! Crown Him! Prophet, and Priest, and King! Christ is coming! over the world victorious, Pow’r and glory unto the Lord belong.

Oh Lord, thank You for filling our mouth with Your praise in Jesus Name. Loving Saviour, thank You for saving our souls. Jesus will reign for ever and ever in our lives and home in Jesus Name. Amen. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!

This my favorite worship hymn. I refreshes my soul and help my to appreciate the Lordship of my Loving Savior the King that reigneth forever. The Lord bless the soul of Fanny and every children of God doing great exploits for the great King.

I feel Heavenly bliss whenever I sing this song. Oh Lord, help me to be among the saints that will sing this wonderful song to Your Glorious Name in Heaven for ever and ever. God bless your precious soul Fanny for this soul touching and Heaven lifting song. And God bless every lover of this song, we shall be there to sing it together in Heaven in Jesus' Name.
Jesus is truly wonderful. Unto Him that loved us and washed us from our sins in His OWN blood be all the glory!

Oh Lord, this year fill our mouth with your praise in Jesus Name. Loving Saviour, thank You for saving our souls. Jesus will reign for ever and ever Amen. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you.
THE NEXT TO LAST LINE IS: Praise Him Praise Him, tell of HIS Excellent Greatness It diminishes the song when they change the intended words of the author who wrote it and that is not pleasing to GOD!
Love it. Love it. Keep up the good work.

I am 83 yrs old have been a Christian since 1945 when I was baptised in immersion. I was born with cerebral palsy degenerative spine short left leg and deformed foot. No power in my leg could walk with a limp but could not kick when swimming; a chronic pain patient on Morphine and strong neuropathic pain killers. Went to a Christian faith healing I heard on 31sr Oct about and in faith Jesus healed me and I AM A NEW PERSON AND THE FIRST HYMN I SANG WAS PRAISE HIM PRAISE HIM SO THIS IS DEAR TO ME. TO GOD BE THE GLORY.
How wonderful it is to get these lovely hymns to brighten our lives. Praise God for this and all those familiar and dear to us.
Singing this amazing hymn brings light and joy to my soul.
Lord be praised forever. I ask for the grace, revelation and insight to write hymns in the generation for You my LORD just as You gave to my brethren in the past centuries. I am lifted indeed!
Jesus brings songs like these to our mind to encourage us when we are at the end of the line.
nice!

Thanks for posting this Hymn. It's amazing, Franny J Crosby wrote more than 8000 Hymns/ Poems throughout her life. That works out to nearly 7 Hymns/ Poems per month! I Praise and thank the Lord for such amazing people of God.

What a wonderful & soul lifting song! My earnest prayer is that, we shall be part of those that will sing this song in heaven, especially we await the trumpet of the rapture to sound any moment from now!

I remember this hymn way back in primary school in Ghana. The words and tune deeply moved me even a that tender age. Today I'm singing it to my daughter as she sleeps. May its beautiful words live on. Praise be to Jesus!!

This is simply a beautiful song to be both memorized and internalized! Glory to God for putting those words and thoughts in mind of the composer! May His church continue to match on in Jesus awesome name! AMEN!

I give glory to our Triune God for putting heavenly songs such as this into the hearts of human vessels. As we will soon be raptured in a matter of days, let's start practicing the ceaseless, eternal worship of our Blessed Redeemer.

Thank you for having this song. Not only the words, but the music! I have had this come up to me so many times and finally I hear the words. All I can say is Praise You Jesus, once again You fill me with Your Love and answer the smallest desire to know the words to this tune in my heart. God Loves us so much! Please be encouraged today! Only He knows our needs and desires and watches over us in everything in our lives. Love on Him today! He inhabits the Praise of his people.
Blessed Redeemer Indeed! Praise Him for His unconditional love. May we reach a little higher today than yesterday. He is coming back really soon. Thanks for sharing this beautiful song!

May God Almighty who has inspired this song bless the vessel He used in writing the lyrics. Jesus lives forevermore. Hail the soon coming King. "We" His elect, will reign with Him till eternity in Jesus' mighty name, AMEEEEEEENNN!!!!!!
This is one of my favourite hymns. It brings me to tears thinking about what my Saviour did for me to save me. How inspiring!

This song is really a touching one that ministers to me in every aspect of my life, that in everything we are in life, we should always give praise to Him (Jesus) who paid the price for us to be noticed and be relevant to God's mission on earth. Praise the Lord.

Precious hymn! One of my a thousands favors hymns. Before I was capture by the Lord in 1992 on the campus college, I though I was an atheist. The same year I attended my first winter training on the book of Job. I was like Job praising my Lord, all my worries, anxieties, doubts, and sorrows were replaced once I saw and received my redeemer. Yes! hail Him who seat's on high and our spirit.
It is so hopeful and joyful. I also like the person who wrote the lyrics.
